name: TokenGroups
description: An API Script to create and manage named groups of tokens on a page, then apply actions (like switching layers) to the whole group at once. Includes GM-only tools to list groups across pages, find where a group lives, and purge deleted token IDs. Enhanced with ScriptCards integration for better formatting and menus.

useroptions.name: enabled_on_boot
useroptions.description: Start TokenGroups enabled when the API sandbox boots.

useroptions.name: render_mode
useroptions.description: Render mode: html (basic HTML) or sc (ScriptCards enhanced formatting).

useroptions.name: auto_menu
useroptions.description: Automatically show menu when creating/updating groups.
